text:
Ed Sheeran opens up about secret struggle with substance abuse

Ed Sheeran opens up about secret struggle with substance abuse. Gray Hall reports during Action News at 6 a.m. on October 21, 2017.

Ed Sheeran is opening up about his secret struggle with substance abuse.

The award winning singer spoke about his troubles on a British talk show.

Sheeran admits he fell into the pitfalls of fame, particularly drinking.

The 26-year-old says he took a year off from the music industry to get himself back on track.

He credits music and his girlfriend for saving him, saying he's cut down on drinking.
